programme.title: Hot Door Night
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Way We Talk, The
programme.desc: This is a soul-searching story about three youths: Wolf, Sophie and Alan, each living with a different form of deafness. Through sign language, they cultivate a profound friendship and offer each other unwavering support. United by love and friendship, the trio embarks on a journey of self-discovery and resilience.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Mei's dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the child's unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Go for Broke
programme.desc: A ruthless drug trafficking group has destroyed countless families due to drug addiction, including Zhang Yao's family. Vowing to take revenge, Zhang Yao teams up with Detective An to take down the drug lords. As their revenge plot unfolds, do they share a common foe or harbour personal agendas?

programme.title: An Abandoned Team
programme.desc: Uncle Jia is bad-tempered and lives alone. His forced retirement, failed marriage and strained relationship with his daughter have left him in despair, prompting him to consider ending his life. Fortunately, he is rescued by a stray dog and an animal welfare volunteer, allowing him to rediscover his purpose in life.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Ne Zha 2
programme.desc: After surviving the Heavenly Lightning Strike, the souls of Ne Zha and Ao Bing persist, but their mortal forms lie in ruins. Master Tai Yi seeks to restore them using the Seven-Colored Lotus, yet countless perils loom over the process. As enemies close in and fate hangs in the balance, can they reclaim their bodies and rewrite their destiny?

programme.title: Oversteer
programme.desc: Adapted from a true story, the film follows Feng, a determined young man who defies his father to pursue his dream of becoming an automotive mechanic. Alongside his childhood friend Yun, he embarks on a daring journey that unexpectedly plunges them into the exhilarating world of racing, sparking a passionate coming-of-age adventure.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Little Red Sweet
programme.desc: A Chinese dessert shop owned by the Chang family in Kowloon City faces upheaval when the mother suffers a devastating stroke. Their daughter sacrifices her dream of becoming a flight attendant to help keep the family business alive, but tensions rise as she clashes with her father. Can they find a way to overcome their struggles and remain united?

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: Sixty Million Dollar Man
programme.desc: Sing is a rich man studying abroad, but is so spoiled that he can never concentrate on his studies but spends his time flirting with girls. One day, Sing gets blown up by a mobster when he hooks up with his mistress, Silvia. This arrogant prankster is resurrected instead as an unbeatable cyborg with unique skills, a real job and a new true love.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head's son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu's until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from “Nine Yang Scriptures” by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiancée suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiancée accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler's apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: Lallan-a stray dog who lives around a house with 4 other Pets & sneaks into the house for food, water & shelter.The 4 pets' sole mission is to keep this stray dog away from them and the family

programme.title: Goli Soda
programme.desc: In Koyambedu market, four carefree coolie boys start a mess to earn respect and identity, transforming their lives and friendships along the way.

programme.title: Theerkatharisi
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger repeatedly calls the police control room, tipping them off about impending crimes and accidents.

programme.title: Kaaviya Thalaivan
programme.desc: Two rival artists at Sivadas drama troupe compete in everything they do. While one of them goes on to become successful, the other fails in life.

programme.title: Nerkonda Paarvai
programme.desc: A retired veteran lawyer returns to defend three women falsely accused in a criminal case, facing powerful enemies and patriarchal biases in court.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Arjun
programme.desc: Two neighbours and childhood friends who share a love-hate relationship with each other find themselves in a loveless marriage.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Paapan
programme.desc: An ex-cop is reinstated to help his estranged daughter and track down a serial killer who always stays one step ahead.

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: The host presents a curated compilation of hit songs and memorable snippets from the most popular and trending Tamil movies, celebrating the best of Tamil cinema.

programme.title: Iru Mugan
programme.desc: Following the attack on the Indian Embassy in Malaysia, Akhilan, an ex-agent, is assigned to track down the culprit. His investigations lead him to his old foe who has now developed a hazardous drug.

programme.title: Kho Kho
programme.desc: Maria, a physical education teacher, takes up the chance to train the school's promising girls' team in the sport of kho-kho. While doing so, she aspires to accomplish her own unfulfilled dream.

programme.title: Detective Shivaji
programme.desc: Detective Shivaji is handed over a high-profile murder case and must soon unravel the mystery surrounding the death while dealing with a personal tragedy.

programme.title: Daddy
programme.desc: Arun Gawli, a young man, is forced to turn to crime for making a livelihood. However, what starts with a simple 'matka' gambling ring, soon turns into a full-fledged criminal network.

programme.title: 3 A.M.
programme.desc: The story of the movie revolves around three friends who are going to make a reality show on the existence of ghosts in the world.

programme.title: Babumoshai Bandookbaaz
programme.desc: The film is a quirky ride of a reputed contract killer, Babu, and revolves around love, friendship, rivalries, and revenge.

programme.title: Behen Hogi Teri
programme.desc: Gattu is head over heels in love with his neighbour, Binny. However, he becomes disheartened when her family and entire neighbourhood treat him as her brother.2017

programme.title: Apaharan
programme.desc: Story of the tumultuous relationship between a father and son, set amidst the kidnapping industry in Bihar.

programme.title: Kohram
programme.desc: When a colonel fails to assassinate a corrupt minister, he assumes a new identity. However, soon, he is tracked down by an undercover major, who decides to join him in exposing the minister.

programme.title: Krrish 3

New housewife and fashion mogul Rachel Zoe makes a dazzling return to Bravo after more than a decade. Single and stepping back into the spotlight on her own terms, she's ready to unveil RZ 2.0 to the world. Also joining the group is housewife Amanda Frances, a self-made businesswoman who lives in her friend Kyle Richards' former family home. She's determined to build her future in the land of fame and fortune.

programme.title: Cobra Kai
programme.desc: Daniel is dismayed to find a new Cobra Kai dojo has been opened up. Johnny learns his dojo has to pass several safety requirements before he can actually start teaching.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiasts Abby, Erin, Jillian and Patty set out to capture ghosts when they realise that someone is attempting to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts in the city of New York.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: In *Oblivion*, Tom Cruise stars as a man on a journey of redemption in a future Earth. Directed by the creator of *TRON: Legacy*, it's a visually stunning sci-fi adventure about confronting the past to save humanity.

programme.title: Mulholland Dr.
programme.desc: A hopeful actress in Los Angeles befriends an amnesiac woman, and as they search for her identity, reality and illusion blur in a dreamlike thriller about ambition, identity, and Hollywood's dark side.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Return To King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Adventurer Flynn Carsen receives a secret map to King Solomon's Mines. When the map is stolen, Flynn sets out to find the map and the Key of Solomon's book, without which the map is useless anyway.

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan stars in Dante's Peak, where a quiet town faces fiery doom from a reawakening volcano. Explosive action and suspense make this disaster thriller a must-see ride!

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as tough detective John Kimble in Kindergarten Cop, going undercover as a teacher to find a drug lord's wife. Packed with action, humor, and heart, it's a classic comedy-thriller.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Before Snow White, two queens clash in The Huntsman: Winter's War. Love, betrayal, and war unfold as Huntsman Eric battles evil to save a kingdom from Ravenna's dark reign.

programme.title: Mulholland Dr.
programme.desc: A hopeful actress in Los Angeles befriends an amnesiac woman, and as they search for her identity, reality and illusion blur in a dreamlike thriller about ambition, identity, and Hollywood's dark side.

programme.title: Backdraft
programme.desc: Two firefighter brothers clash while battling deadly arsons in Chicago. With explosive action and a gripping mystery, Backdraft stars Kurt Russell, William Baldwin, and Robert De Niro.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Munich's high-speed Autobahn.

programme.title: Rambo 3
programme.desc: Combat has taken its toll on Rambo, but he's finally begun to find inner peace in a monastery. When Rambo's friend and mentor Col. Trautman asks for his help on a top secret mission to Afghanistan, Rambo declines but must reconsider when Trautman is captured.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiasts Abby, Erin, Jillian and Patty set out to capture ghosts when they realise that someone is attempting to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts in the city of New York.

programme.title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Spain
programme.desc: Anton and Giovanni's Spanish adventure kicks off in Seville. Anton goes back to his roots as the boys explore the Andalusian region of this magnificent country together.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: In Panama, Robson fishes for yellowfin, oysters, dorado and peacock bass.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: Hannah Fry discovers the hidden WWII radar technology that heats up baked beans and learns the legend of the melted candy bar in an engineer's pocket that kick-started a kitchen revolution.

programme.title: Cheetah Family & Me
programme.desc: We follow Savannah and her four cubs in the Tswalu Kalahari Reserve.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.desc: A team of scientists and filmmakers heads to Antarctica to study the most sophisticated hunts in the animal kingdom - killer whales making waves to wash seals off floating ice.

programme.desc: Martin travels to Guam to see the effect of invasive species on remote islands; discovering animals and humans driven to the edge of extinction. programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Follow the southern team as they test new migration tech and tools that could reduce shark attacks in a popular snorkelling spot. Then catch and tag bull sharks with the northern team, who want to help local swimmers steer clear of birthing mothers.

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badger's risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan's symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat's alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat's strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Shark Squad
programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Travel to the ends of Australia's shark highways. Find out if Greenly Island in the south is a truck stop for migrating great whites, then search for proof of a genetic connection between northern bull sharks and their cooler-climate cousins.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Follow the southern team as they test new migration tech and tools that could reduce shark attacks in a popular snorkelling spot. Then catch and tag bull sharks with the northern team, who want to help local swimmers steer clear of birthing mothers.

programme.title: Animals Like Us
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness' flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters' club.

programme.desc: The sense of touch is useful to feel physical forces such as bites, changes in temperature and texture. Some animals have become extra sensitive to very faint vibrations, which gives them a lot of information about their environment.

programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan's symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat's alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat's strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield

programme.desc: Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits' fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, “Bridges Aflame.” Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he's applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby's cover at stake, it's up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The kids are low on supplies in the Sahara and stumble on a town with a well that has mysteriously run dry. The crew decides to investigate and discovers a Cleve Kelso-controlled water facility that's stealing water from the village. They manage to blow up the facility, but it alerts Rafaela and Matsuo to their whereabouts.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: In an awesome chase/battle through the desert, the crew goes up against Rafaela, Matsuo, and Sandocal - who are driving the kids' own cars. The crew struggles to fight back while also not losing the trail to Cleve's base in the desert. When Rafaela turns on Sandocal, he and Layla decide to work together and manage to overpower Rafaela and Matsuo. Sandocal tells the kids to go to escape toward the Bedouin Shield.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: It's revealed that Cleve is building a massive weather machine that is generating dangerous desert storms, with the help of a genius North African teen named Ziri. When Cleve creates a sandstorm to take out the crew, they're saved by two Bedouin brothers named Kareem and Salem (and their pack of camels). Echo questions her ability to be a good leader and if they should give up. But after the storm clears, Tony challenges the brothers to a camel race in order to get their help tracking down Cleve - and he wins! Now the Bedouins have to take the kids to the Eye of the Sahara, a huge strange storm that they know has something to do with Cleve's plot. Elsewhere in the Sahara, Ms. Nowhere and Gary are captured by Cleve.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Australian Story - Sink or Swim - Michael Klim
programme.desc: Six years ago, Olympic champion Michael Klim almost lost the ability to walk. Then he received a devastating diagnosis. In this moving episode, Klim reveals how he hit rock bottom but ultimately emerged stronger. (Return)

programme.title: Great Australian Walks
programme.desc: Julia Zemior walks around the lake at the heart of our bush capital, discovering ancient and modern history...and Australia's largest musical instrument.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Woodland Wanderers
programme.desc: If you go down to the woods today you might just find Phil Breslin tracking down a yellow-bellied glider, an eastern brown snake and the cuddliest of all Australians, the koala.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Autumn: Seasonal Colour & Native Flowers
programme.desc: Costa gets playful with planting design, Josh tackles Queensland Fruit Fly, Millie offers autumn colour options, Hannah visits a heritage garden preparing for climate change, and we meet a team conserving rare native plants.

programme.title: Back Roads - Camperdown, VIC
programme.desc: Camperdown in Southwest Victoria is a town nestled between dormant volcanoes and majestic crater lakes. Kerry Staight discovers a community that embraces its Scottish heritage while also supporting locals going their own way.

programme.title: Planet America
programme.desc: As Trump steamrolls through the second year of his second term, Chas and John are here each week to guide you through the mayhem - covering Iran, ICE, tariffs, NATO, Russia/Ukraine, Gaza, Greenland, the midterms and more.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Pizza!
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining with The Cook Up. Adam is joined by two pizza crust-dough-dians, Luke Powell from Bella Brutta and Jess Smith from City Oltra, for a pizza party.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals
programme.desc: Aggressive behaviour is not limited to the most obvious culprits. Exploring some surprising behaviour and illustrating that forceful strategies can be necessary for survival.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: UFC 325: Volkanovski vs. Lopes 2 - Prelims
programme.desc: On Sunday, February 1, UFC returns to Sydney Olympic Park, New South Wales, Australia for UFC 325 which will be headlined by a featherweight championship rematch between titleholder Alexander “The Great” Volkanovski and challenger Diego Lopes. The duo faced off for the vacant featherweight title last April at UFC 314 in Miami, with Volkanovski earning a unanimous decision victory to reclaim in the throne in the 145-pound weight class.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded - UFC 315: Muhammad vs Della Maddalena
programme.desc: When the Octagon returns to Montreal for the first time since 2015, fans are treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena, and Manon Fiorot battles to be the first female French champion against Flyweight phenom Valentina Shevchenko. Plus, the return of Jose Aldo and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 - 12
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola - 15
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
